priority.if: railway_class == ABANDONED || railway_class == DISUSED || railway_class == PROPOSED || railway_class == CONSTRUCTION || railway_class == RAZED

speed.if: railway_class == ABANDONED || railway_class == DISUSED || railway_class == PROPOSED || railway_class == CONSTRUCTION || railway_class == RAZED

speed.else_if: railway_service == SIDING || railway_service == SPUR || railway_service == YARD
